categories: Category:Star Wars: Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu

nodes.text: Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu 4

Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu 4 is the fourth, penultimate issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu. The issue was written by Matt Owens, illustrated by Denys Cowan and Edgar Salazar, and published on November 29, 2017 by Marvel Comics.
Mace's faith in the Jedi path is tested when he is challenged – by one of his own!
